thread.section_title: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance | calcas.com | 4 of 27
thread.title: Emily Hall
thread.title_full: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance reviewed by Emily Hall

author: Emily Hall
title: Emily Hall
text: Since the end of 2016, my husband and I have been working with Damien Maynard to try to add an additional home to our policy and change the existing home on our policy to a rental (wanting to do this all at once). Damien has been minimally or non responsive to questions and phone calls that would allow us to complete this policy change and switch our current home to California Casualty. This is incredibly frustrating, and very unlike my past experiences with this company.
